subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets scored 44 points in the fourth quarter, but the Raptors slipped away to take a 3-2 series lead behind the effervescent play of Kyle Lowry.
snippet: The Nets scored 44 points in the fourth quarter, but the Raptors slipped away to take a 3-2 series lead behind the effervescent play of Kyle Lowry.
